text: o visvasulara! Miru sampadincina dani nundi mariyu memu mi koraku bhumi nundi utpatti cesina vati nundi, melaina vatine (allah marganlo) kharcu pettandi. E vastuvulanaite miru kandlu musukune gani tisukoro, alanti cedda vastuvulanu (itarulapai) kharcu ceyataniki uddesincakandi. Mariyu allah svayam samrd'dhudu, prasansaniyudani telusukondi
